sentences.en: " Give me 1643, " he called to Central , after looking up the Michigan Central depot number.
sentences.cn: “ 请接1643, " 他查到了密执安中心火车站的号码后,对总机说.

sentences.en: " You'd like to see Michigan Avenue.
sentences.cn: “ 你一定要去看看密歇根大街.

sentences.en: Chrysler engineers in Michigan had designed the world's most sophisticated tank.
sentences.cn: 克莱斯勒公司在密执安的工程师设计出了世界上最精密的油箱.

sentences.en: Did the University of Michigan win another football game?
sentences.cn: 是不是Michigan大学又赢得了一场足球赛?

sentences.en: Did you go to Michigan too, Grandpa?
Grandpa, when did Dad graduate from Michigan?
sentences.cn: 爷爷, 爸爸是什么时候从Michigan毕业的?

sentences.en: He points out that some past offenders in Michigan have been released only to cause havoc and end up in jail again.
sentences.cn: 他指出，过去密歇根释放的一些犯人只是与造成严重破坏的人有关，而且最后又都重新回到监狱里。

sentences.en: He quotes some students from the University of Michigan.
sentences.cn: 他引述了几位密歇根大学学生的话。

sentences.en: He's the Dean of Admissions for the University of Michigan.
sentences.cn: 他是Michigan大学的新生注册主任.

sentences.en: Henry Ford's assembly line produced Model Ts by the millions in Detroit, Michigan.
sentences.cn: 亨利?福特的组装线于在密西根州的底特律量产了许多ModelT的车子.

sentences.en: How was your interview with Michigan?
sentences.cn: 你跟Michigan大学的人面谈得 如何 ?

sentences.en: It doesn't mean you're going to Michigan.
sentences.cn: 这并不是说你就要去Michigan大学.

sentences.en: More than a foot of snow blanketed parts of Michigan.
sentences.cn: 密歇根州的部分地区被超过一英尺厚的积雪所覆盖。

sentences.en: She grew up in a wealthy suburb of Detroit in Michigan and did well at school.
sentences.cn: 她在密歇根底特律一个富裕的郊区长大，在学校表现也很好。

sentences.en: Wakoski is writer in residence at Michigan State University.
sentences.cn: 瓦科斯基是密歇根州立大学的常驻作家。

sentences.en: What time does the Michigan football game come on?

sentences.cn: 是啊Michigan队需要一次达阵得分.

sentences.en: You couldn't pick a finer medical school than Michigan.
sentences.cn: 你再也找不到一所比Michigan大学更好的医学院了?
